titleStmt.title: Some principles of the elect people of God in scorn called Quakers
titleStmt.author: Penington, Isaac, 1616-1679.
Fox, George, 1624-1691.

notesStmt.note: Variously attributed to George Fox and Isaac Penington.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: some pages faded with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
